name: Hex
tagline: Display hexadecimal view of any input
body:
### Welcome to Hex project Home page
Hex is a simple command line tool allowing display hexadecimal representation of any input source (number, string, standard input, file).

Usage samples:
```
hex -d 134
hex "john doe"
hex -s "john doe"
hex HEX
```

### Installation
From the folder where you unzip project, type the following commands:
```
make
make install
```

### Authors and Contributors
For now, @gghez is the only contributor of this project.

### Support or Contact
Have a look to the wiki pages for more use cases.
